metadata.Title: CVE-2022-42800 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: This issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in iOS 15.7.1 and iPadOS 15.7.1, macOS Ventura 13, watchOS 9.1, iOS 16.1 and iPadOS 16, macOS Monterey 12.6.1, macOS Big Sur 11.7.1. A user may be able to cause unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> since 3.1.3-7, rsync builds with the system zlib as of 2022-12-06, no indication that is isn't an Apple-specific issue, marking as not-affected

criterions.comment: rsync: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
zlib: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
